name: msna-react-node-cesium-selfhealing
description: Self-healing dev: React (Vite) + Cesium + DevExtreme + Node/Express API, with OpenFlights sample routes

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix client install
scripts.install:all:legacy: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix server install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix client install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.dev: npx concurrently -k "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules package-lock.json client/package-lock.json server/package-lock.json
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm --prefix server run start
